resources.string:
Welcome to the Shoe Store Inventory app. This app is part of a Udacity project, and it allows you to add new shoes to the store. 

The app has these screens: 

1. Login 

2. Onboarding 

3. Shoe listing 

4. Shoe detail page 

The shoe listing page will show the list of shoes and a button for adding a new shoe, while the detail page will be for adding a shoe entry. All entries will be saved only as long as the app is running. 

Click Next to learn how to use this app.
Press on the Shoe List button to go to the main screen, where you can create a new shoe listing and add it to the store.
